item.description: During my projects, I like to build concrete applications from the research I conduct. I use them to demonstrate the capacity of a trained model or a pipeline I developed but also use the code in a more general purpose. To build these apps I use a combination of three tools: Streamlit, FastAPI, and Docker. In this post, I first show two examples of applications I’ve created, and then I present the tools with some simple examples of code.
